songs.title: Until The Water Flows Over
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When I get back on solid ground
Here's what I'm gonna do
Oh, all I've ever lost and found
I'm gonna crawl my way to you

[Verse 2]
When I get back on my feet again
I'm gonna take you to the moon
But you're leaving my hands again
I can wait up there until

[Outro]
Oh, the water
The water flows over
Oh, the water
The water flows over
